content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello, Emilia. Let's negotiate the price of the apartment. I am aiming for the highest possible price. Please make your first offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I recognize your goal but as a responsible tenant from Germany I prefer a fair agreement. To initiate, I propose a rental price of 650 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: That is a very low offer, Emilia. I am looking for a much higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding your perspective but sticking to my sensible approach, I increase the offer to 720 Euros monthly for the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: That's still too low, Emilia. I am sure you can do better. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Recognizing your need for a higher price, I adjust my proposal to 780 Euros per month, hoping it meets your expectations for this well-located apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, that's a better offer, but I am still looking for more. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: With a deep regard for fairness, I raise my offer to 825 Euros per month for the apartment in Duisburg city center.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, that is a significant improvement, but I am still looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Keeping my goal of finding common ground yet responding to your need for a higher price, I revise my offer to 850 Euros monthly for the apartment rental.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, that's a good offer, but I am still looking for a little bit more. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
